skyline_banner.promotionOffer: Extra 10% off Appliances & More | Online Only
skyline_banner.seeDetailsText:
SEARS IS PROUD TO OFFER AN EXTRA 10% OFF DISCOUNT TO THE MILITARY, FIRST RESPONDERS, HEALTHCARE WORKERS & TEACHERS USING ID.ME FOR VALIDATION.
How to Get Your Discount:
1. Add items to your cart as you shop. When finished, proceed to checkout.
2. Look for the bright green Verify with ID.me button under GROUP DISCOUNT.
3. This will take you to the ID.me verification portal to answer a few questions.
4. Once verified, you will be taken back to Sears checkout.
5. The 10% discount will automatically be applied to qualifying items in your cart.
